_header: All tho that list of women evil to speak
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 116.
Subjects: women, praise of; love, instructions regarding; love, game of
_description: A praise of women — twenty-five stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
Al tho þat list of wemen evill to speikAnd say of thame wer
                    than thay deserue…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Quhair all gude wemen salbe in feirIn hevin aboif among the
                    angellis cleir
